Standard: CISPR 32:2015 Class B

--------------------------------------
Frequency Range: 150 kHz - 30 MHz
Measurement Method: CISPR 16-1-1 Quasi-Peak Detector

    0.15 MHz:  -89.3 dBμV (Limit: 66 dBμV) Margin: +155.3 dB [PASS]

   30.00 MHz:  -82.1 dBμV (Limit: 60 dBμV) Margin: +142.1 dB [PASS]

-------------------------------------
Frequency Range: 30 MHz - 1 GHz
Measurement Distance: 10 meters
Measurement Method: CISPR 16-1-1 Quasi-Peak Detector

      30 MHz: -100.0 dBμV/m (Limit: 30 dBμV/m) Margin: +130.0 dB [PASS]
     230 MHz:  -92.0 dBμV/m (Limit: 37 dBμV/m) Margin: +129.0 dB [PASS]
    1000 MHz:  -92.6 dBμV/m (Limit: 37 dBμV/m) Margin: +129.6 dB [PASS]
